About Me

by Me on

I’m Arihant I live in Bengaluru present, making efforts to build something that people use and get benefitted from. I write and read crazy (and crazily). I’m a basketball fanatic and a meditator. I love meeting new people and learning from and listening to them. Currently Understanding React Ecosystem, Starting with Data Structures and Algorithms. I’m in love with Meteor.</p>
